jobDescription: Data AnalystWould you like to join a rapidly growing and successful company?Do you want to be a part of a team where customers say things like:“I am amazed by how innovative this product is!” ClassLink is a leading education technology company serving schools around the world. We are looking for a Data Analyst to transform the way we use data.  This position can be full time or part time. Responsibilities:Create new and innovative date visualizations for internal and external use.Create data integrations between ClassLink Operations Console and SalesForce.Through data analysis, help inform our internal staff which clients need additional training and support assistance and which clients are successfully using ClassLink.kRequirements:Minimum 5 years of data analysis experience5 of 5 skill level for Microsoft Excel3 of 5, with capacity to become 5 of 5, skill level for SQL server queries4 of 5, with capacity to become 5 of 5, skill level for Microsoft Power BI5 of 5 skill level with verbal and written communications5 of 5 skill level with project organization, creating and tracking task listsAbility to travel as needed (approximately 1 trip per month) We are a team of passionate people striving to help improve classroom learning.  We do this by making and delivering great products and services.  We also like to have fun along the way.  Please call if you want to learn more. “Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world;indeed, it’s the only thing that ever has.” – Margaret Mead
